text: Doofus or dufus is slang for a person prone to stupidity or foolishness, and may refer to *Dufus (band), an American anti-folk band *Doofus (comics), an alternative comic by Rick Altergott *Doofus Drake, a character on DuckTales == See also == *Dofus, a 2004 fantasy MMORPG *Doof (disambiguation)
title: Doofus
